author: KA, Horsham

review: I bought this fire tv as a gift for my parents on Christmas. Since my parents are older they do not have an Xbox or ps4 like I do and did not have a smart tv. Since I have a console I have access to the internet and to apps like Prime an Netflix. My parents did not but now its been about 2 weeks and they love the gift. The remote is easy to use and straight forward. I would have given this review a 5 but for some reason there is not an Off switch for the fire tv box. I don't know yet if the box gets turned off by accident how the device will start up when turned back on. Will say that the initial start up if the device is fast only if you have fast internet. My parents did not and the device too about 30 to 40 minutes to download the software then the software had to install and once it started had to download the apps like prime and Netflix but afterwards was easy to use. Overall would suggest to buy the product only if the person buying it doesn't have a smart tv or a gaming console.
author: Brittney Corona

review: Wow.  I was pleasantly surprised by this device.  I have an Apple TV and a NetGear 300SL, but neither of them would play Amazon Prime videos.  I've been playing them from my iPad thru the Apple TV, but that was not a very easy way to do it and I frequently experienced hangs and drops.  The Amazon Fire TV is very fast and the interface is very intuitive.  The speech search feature works well and is definitely more convenient than typing on the Apple screen "matrix".  I haven't explored all the features yet, but so far, I'm very pleased. Setup was very easy... it even knew who I was and logged me into my Amazon Prime account when I first connected without my intervention... a nice touch.
author: Howard M. Smith

review: Purchased for our 2nd TV and is just great. Inexpensive (got it while on sale), absolutely intuitive remote, beautiful picture, pretty good menu. Almost got the stick, but got this due to the better remote being included, which is fun to use for amazon content, but not super helpful since it doesnt work for all apps. Also using for netflix which works well.

author: Aminah777

review: Bought this to watch Netflix and Hulu Plus and Amazon Prime movies on my TV. I got it and installed it in about 10 minutes, connected it to my wireless and activated my prime account (automatic because I ordered it on Amazon Prime) and my hulu account and my netflix. The picture is incredible. I did have a problem. For some reason my TV's HDMI port would not pickup any sound. So I tried a few things with no luck. I ended up ordering a digital sound cable and a digital to analog audio converter. Both items with tax cost me about $17.81 on Amazon. Same items at radio shack over $40.00's. I got these items in connected my amazon fire tv box via the digital audio cable to the digital to analog audio converter box and that box to my surround sound box and it works beautifully. I highly recommend it. Just know you may need the 2 extra items as I did.
